newer_release.name: Runtimes 2.0.1
newer_release.body:
# Changelog

Changelog for the runtimes governed by the Polkadot Fellowship.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/).

## [2.0.1] 04.11.2025

### Removed

 - Remove AHM Test code to speed up CI ([#997](https://github.com/polkadot-fellows/runtimes/pull/997))
 - Relinquish AHM multisig functionality post AHM ([#997](https://github.com/polkadot-fellows/runtimes/pull/997))

### Changed

- Bump deps ([#997](https://github.com/polkadot-fellows/runtimes/pull/997))

# Runtime info
*These runtimes were built with **rustc 1.88.0 (6b00bc388 2025-06-23)** using **[srtool v0.18.3](https://github.com/paritytech/srtool)***

To replicate the build, use the following command:
```sh
srtool build
       --root --profile production
       --package CRATE_NAME --runtime-dir PATH_TO_CRATE
       --build-opts=""
```

ai_analysis:
# Polkadot Fellows Runtimes v2.0.1 Release Analysis

## 1. Executive Summary for Non-Technical Users

### Main Improvements
This is a **maintenance release** focused on internal improvements and cleanup. The changes primarily affect the development and testing infrastructure rather than end-user functionality.

**Key improvements:**
- **Faster development process**: Removed outdated testing procedures that were slowing down software updates
- **Better infrastructure**: Improved the automated systems that build and test the software
- **Version alignment**: Updated all runtime versions to properly reflect the 2.0 release

### Benefits for Users
- **Faster updates**: Future releases will come out more quickly due to streamlined testing
- **More reliable software**: Improved development infrastructure leads to better quality control
- **No disruption**: These are behind-the-scenes improvements that don't require any user action

### Actions Required
**None** - This is a maintenance release that doesn't require any action from users, validators, or dApp developers.

## 2. Key Changes Explained

### Performance Improvements
- **Faster CI/CD Pipeline**: Removed Asset Hub Migration (AHM) tests that were no longer needed, significantly speeding up the development and release process
- **Optimized Infrastructure**: All development jobs now run on dedicated self-hosted machines, providing more consistent and faster build times

### Maintenance & Cleanup
- **Code Cleanup**: Removed over 6,600 lines of outdated test code related to Asset Hub Migration
- **Dependency Updates**: Updated various software dependencies to their latest versions
- **Version Standardization**: All runtime spec versions updated to 2.0 (version 2_000_000)

### No Breaking Changes
This release contains no breaking changes - all existing functionality remains the same.

### No Security Changes
No security-specific improvements were included in this maintenance release.

### No New Features
This release focuses purely on maintenance and doesn't introduce new user-facing features.

## 3. Technical Summary for Developers

### Infrastructure Changes
- **CI/CD Migration**: All GitHub Actions workflows now use `self-hosted` runners instead of `ubuntu-latest`
- **Dependency Management**: Added `lz4` package to installation dependencies
- **Test Removal**: Complete removal of AHM (Asset Hub Migration) integration tests for Polkadot

### Runtime Spec Versions
All runtimes updated to spec version `2_000_000`:
- Polkadot relay chain
- Kusama relay chain  
- Asset Hub Polkadot/Kusama
- Bridge Hub Polkadot/Kusama
- People Chain Polkadot/Kusama
- Coretime Polkadot/Kusama
- Encoiner parachain
- Glutton Kusama

### No API Changes
- No breaking changes to runtime APIs
- No migration requirements for existing integrations
- Existing RPC calls and extrinsics remain unchanged

### Development Impact
- Faster CI pipeline due to AHM test removal
- Consistent build environment with self-hosted runners
- Updated `Cargo.lock` with latest dependency versions

## 4. Code Impact Analysis

### Most Affected Systems
1. **CI/CD Infrastructure** (14 files changed): Complete migration to self-hosted runners
2. **Integration Tests** (Major cleanup): Removal of entire AHM test suite
3. **Runtime Specifications** (13 files): Version number updates across all runtimes

### Types of Changes
- **Infrastructure Refactoring (70%)**: GitHub Actions workflow updates and CI improvements
- **Code Cleanup (25%)**: Removal of obsolete test code and dependencies
- **Version Management (5%)**: Spec version bumps for proper release tracking

### Change Scope
- **High Impact on Development**: Significantly improved CI/CD pipeline efficiency
- **Zero Impact on Runtime Logic**: No changes to blockchain functionality
- **Zero Impact on User Experience**: Purely internal improvements

### File Change Statistics
- **Total files modified**: 66 files across 3 PRs
- **Net code reduction**: 6,654 lines removed (cleanup focus)
- **Most significant PR**: Post AHM cleanup (39 files, 6,570 net lines removed)

This release represents excellent maintenance practices - cleaning up technical debt while improving development infrastructure without disrupting end users.

- Remove AHM checks to speed up CI
- Bump deps
- Remove AHM multisig since we dont need it anymore
